creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular black fabric with orange satin border; fabric is heavily embroidered in cross stitch with pyramids, sun and palm trees; word "Egypt" at left in center of design; central design surrounded by border of abstract designs and then outer borders of smaller criss crosses and final embroidered edge of metallic gold thread; zipper in back
title: Panel (pillow cover)
